summary.span: 命名空间包含用于读取在应用程序配置文件中的 [<system.xml.serialization> 元素](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md) 节下找到的值的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes used to read the values found in application configuration files under the [<system.xml.serialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md) section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类由序列化基础结构使用，用于处理配置元素，但不能直接使用。The classes in this namespace are used by the serialization infrastructure to handle the configuration elements and cannot be used directly. 有关配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[配置文件架构](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md)。For more information about configuration files, see [Configuration File Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md). 相反，若要配置或，创建应用程序配置文件，并使用以下 XML 元素：Instead, to configure the or , create an application configuration file and use the following XML elements: - [<system.xml.serialization>元素<system.xml.serialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md) - [<schemaImporterExtensions>元素<schemaImporterExtensions> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextensions-element.md) - [<添加>元素<xmlSchemaImporterExtensions><add> Element for <xmlSchemaImporterExtensions>](~/docs/standard/serialization/add-element-for-xmlschemaimporterextensions.md) - [<dateTimeSerialization>元素<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) - [<xmlSerializer>元素<xmlSerializer> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/xmlserializer-element.md)
